title: Bug 137464 - Data preview not refreshing after applying filter on Join dataset in chart editor's select data page
OB: After applying a filter with row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1, the data preview does not refresh as expected.
EB: Upon applying a filter with row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1, the data preview should refresh, reflecting the changes made by the filter.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the attached file. 2. Create a chart and choose the select data page. 3. Use the Join dataset and set the X Y series. 4. Apply a filter with row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1. Check the data preview to observe that it does not refresh as expected.
